long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reportifi.ai transcribes and generates AI summaries, organization and analysis for your online meetings or qualitative research interviews conducted on Zoom or Google Meet.    Unlock the power of seamless transcription and comprehensive summaries with the Reportifi.ai Chrome Extension. Designed for Zoom and Google Meet, our extension integrates the advanced capabilities of our Quali and Scripti services to revolutionize how you capture and utilize meeting and interview data.

Key Features:
Real-Time Transcription: Get accurate, real-time transcriptions of your Zoom and Google Meet sessions, ensuring you never miss a detail.

Quali - Power Up Your Research Findings!
Tailored for market researchers, Quali simplifies and enhances your qualitative market or academic research interviews conducted on Zoom or Google Meet. With Quali, you will receive the following in your project folder. 
- Transcription: Conduct your interviews on Zoom or Google Meet, and the Reportifi.ai Chrome Extension will provide you with precise transcriptions.
- Organized Responses: Receive well-organized responses to each interview question, making data analysis a breeze.
- Question Summaries: Get concise summaries for each interview question, highlighting key points and insights.
- Executive Summaries: Obtain high-level summaries of your interviews, aligned to your research objectives.
- Key Business Question Summaries: Gain focused summaries addressing critical business questions, helping you make informed decisions.
- Top-Line Report Slides: Automatically generate top-line report slides for presentations, giving you a head start on your analysis and reporting.

Scripti - Get Meeting Minutes at Your Fingertips!
Ideal for everyday meetings, Scripti enhances your productivity by providing real-time meeting transcription and summaries for Zoom or Google Meet meetings. With Scripti, you will receive the following:
- Instant Transcription: Launch your Zoom or Google Meet session, and the Reportifi.ai Chrome Extension will transcribe your meeting in real time using the Chrome Extension.
- Key Meeting Summaries and Follow-up Items: After the meeting, Scripti will provide the transcription, a detailed summary  included key meeting highlights and follow-up items all sent exclusively to your account. This allows you to edit and add context before distributing to attendees.  
-You will also receive an email with the summary, meeting highlights, and follow-up items and a link to the meeting transcript.

Why Choose Reportifi.ai?
Efficiency: Save time and effort with automated transcriptions and summaries, allowing you to focus on what truly matters.
Accuracy: Our cutting-edge technology ensures high accuracy in capturing every word spoken.
Convenience: Seamlessly integrate with your existing workflow in Zoom and Google Meet.
Privacy & Security: We prioritize your data security. Your transcriptions and summaries are confidential and only accessible by you.
Whether you're conducting market research interviews or managing team or client meetings, the Reportifi.ai Chrome Extension is your ultimate companion for transforming conversations into actionable insights. Install now and elevate your productivity!

Get Started Today:
Install the Extension: Click "Add to Chrome" to install the Reportifi.ai extension.
Sign In: Log in with your Reportifi.ai account.
Start Transcribing: Launch your Zoom or Google Meet session and let Reportifi.ai handle the rest.
Experience the future of meeting and interview management with Reportifi.ai. Download now and take the first step towards smarter, more efficient communication.
